issue.title: [Rust] Implement high-level Parquet writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4392](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4392). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We only have low-level parquet writer at the moment, which requires user to specify values, definition levels, repetition levels, etc. This is inconvenient. Instead, we should offer high-level Parquet writer that hide these details.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4392?focusedCommentId=16948591) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
`[~csun]` Are you still planning on working on this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4392?focusedCommentId=16948597) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
`[~liurenjie1024]` You might be interested in working on this as well?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4392?focusedCommentId=16949180) by Renjie Liu (liurenjie1024):*
`[~andygrove]`  Yes it looks interesting to me. I'll take this if `[~csun]`  is not available.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4392?focusedCommentId=17332019) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
